headline: Sony sold Netflix the rights to ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ in a pandemic-era safety play—and now it’s Netflix’s biggest movie ever
summary: “KPop Demon Hunters” is a potential billion-dollar franchise for Netflix, potentially what “Frozen” is for Disney. As for Sony … not so much.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Netflix (NFLX) Expanding Into Live Sports and Box Office Hits
summary: In recent days, Netflix’s animated film “KPop Demon Hunters” surged to the top of the North American box office, and the company secured exclusive streaming rights for the 2026 World Baseball Classic in Japan, its first live sports event in that country. These developments illustrate Netflix’s expanding reach through both successful theatrical releases and increased investment in live event streaming to attract diverse global audiences. We’ll explore how Netflix’s move into live sports...
